Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: AX
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a christmas present and the person I bought it for loves all the features and the best is the wireless upload to Facebook. And that they can connect the camera to their iPhone and take a clear picture.

Reviews.Title: love it so so so much!
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: love it so so so much！it is super! strongly recommend! really nice camera! It is so convenient to use to take self photo!

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Deng Tianyi
Reviews.Content: The camera's color is very beautiful in the web sit, but I find it id different when I get it. But the pink color also is ok. I like the Photo Editing In-Camera. And I can use the wifi to connect with my ipad, iPhone, and computer! Cool!~ If you like to take a photo by yourself, it is a best choose.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!! Must buy!!
Reviews.Author: Chubby bunny
Reviews.Content: OMG I'm just soo happy now, the package arrived really fast. And the camera is gorgeous, it's light, and better than I expected. Thank u and keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: Love it! I Recommend it a 100%
Reviews.Author: JoHaNiTa Ta. "JuanaKutch"
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera since the beginning of May/2013. I think it is an AMAZING camera for all the features it offers and the quality of the pictures. I strongly believe that those who have said that this camera takes distorted pics, have gotten a defective one. My camera almost never takes bad pictures (unless I shook it or it has had the wrong settings). I love the WiFi connection (very easy to use and with several options, including cloud storage). The flipping screen, the beauty palette, the beauty shot, the low light shot, and the gesture shot are very cool and innovative features. The small and portable size, the color, the possibility to transfer those pictures to your smart phone to edit them better, or to just simply upload them directly to your Facebook account, send them to your email address, etc, make this camera my favorite over my other two. I have nothing bad to say about this little but amazingly built device. Look at the price: it isn't the cheapest camera, but it does give a lot for what it is worth, compared to other cameras out there that are sold for the same price or more... I really like it, enjoy using it, and my friends love it when I bring it to our events because out of all the cameras and smart phones used, mine always have taken the best pics!!

Reviews.Title: Color is good.
Reviews.Author: Cindy Xie
Reviews.Content: The color is good ! I like it !!! But sometime it's fuzzy image for long time.The touch screen is difficult to induction.worse than my imagine.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever seen, returned without hesitation
Reviews.Author: sirius
Reviews.Content: The image was so distorted! You will find the image become stretched if you use it vertically and squeezed if horizontally. Even worse than a smartphone! Besides the touchscreen is not very responsive either. BAD BAD BAD!

ProductInfo.Features:
Social Media Maven: No longer will you have to trust strangers with your digital camera, or ask friends to take your picture. The flip-out display rotates up to 180deg. so you can effortlessly snap self-portraits to share your travels online
High Quality Images: While this camera is designed for self-portraits and photo sharing, what good would all of those images be if they were blurry and pixelated? With the MV900's 16 megapixel BSI CMOS sensor you won't have anything to worry about there
Large AMOLED Touchscreen Display: Going beyond the screen size of even large DSLR cameras, the 3.3" WVGA AMOLED C-TSP may sound like a bunch of confusing jargon, but is actually one of the largest and most detailed displays for point-and-shoot cameras
Full HD Recording: The 1920 x 1080 resolution is captured at 60 fps, meaning this isn't even your 'ordinary' Full HD normally captured at 30 fps, but is actually 60i quality instead
Hands-Free with Gesture Shot: Just when you thought taking self-portraits couldn't be easier with the flip-screen, Gesture Shot takes self- and group portraits right out of your hands and into the air
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung MV900F Multiview Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Pink)
